title: Help & Support
empty_tickets: No tickets yet. Tap “New Ticket” at the top right to create one.
faq_a1: A. For security, screenshots are blocked in the app.
faq_q2: Q. How long is a share link valid?
faq_a2: A. The default is 30 minutes; you can shorten it when creating the link.
